subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: On the brutal climb to Alpe d’Huez, Andy Schleck of Luxembourg battled his way into the Tour de France lead, despite Alberto Contador’s desperate attempt to challenge him.
snippet: On the brutal climb to Alpe d’Huez, Andy Schleck of Luxembourg battled his way into the Tour de France lead, despite Alberto Contador’s desperate attempt to challenge him.
